name: Section 8
description:
Section 8® is an intense first-person shooter that gives players unprecedented strategic control over the battlefield, employing tactical assets and on-demand vehicle deliveries to dynamically alter the flow of combat. Set in the distant future when humanity is facing a growing insurrection among its colonies, Earth dispatches the elite 8th Armored Infantry to turn the tide.

Get a full game packed with explosive content:
- Campaign: Take command of Alex Corde in the story-driven single player campaign
- Multiplayer: 11 large-scale battlegrounds with up to 32 players
- Instant Action: Play all multiplayer maps offline with robust bot support
- Exciting game modes, including Conquest, Swarm, and more!

Specifics:
HDD Space Required: More than 3620 MB
DUALSHOCK®3 wireless controller required for vibration function
Wireless controller required for motion sensor function
720p HD support
